PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10712021-12-29,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC
ActCanada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act (Lockdown Order Definition and Minimum Lockdown Period)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA WORKER LOCKDOWN BENEFIT ACT (LOCKDOWN ORDER DEFINITION AND MINIMUM LOCKDOWN PERIOD) to amend temporarily (from December 19, 2021 to February 12, 2021) the definition of “lockdown order” to include partial closures (to 50%), and require that provinces or territories acknowledge that orders made by sub-provincial or sub-territorial governments meet the revised definition. In addition, the regulations permanently remove the requirement that violations of public health orders be subject to penalties and permanently reduce the minimum length of an order from fourteen days to 7 days.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0276 Publication Date: 2022-01-19
AttachmentsAttachment
